marklogic.body:
Ah, now that you get you for accusing another poster for something he did not do.
The more I think about your posting mannerisms, the more I think you are BlueJay aka JR.Â BlueJay did disappear about the same time you showed up.
What we have here ladies and gentlemen is BlueJay re-sexed and recanned as a moderate (Cough) poster.Â Yet somehow this gentle (Cough) moderate poster keeps posting things only the Banned BlueJay would know about and knows pushes the buttons of other posters.
Even funnier that XXX is showing that poster some intimate lovin' on the forums.
